description.value:
>@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.YMGOKoZtKgJqIsAD]{Mechanic Trick}

You’ve installed routines in your drone that enable it to adventure efficiently through strange and alien worlds. Add the following to the list of feats your drone can select: @Compendium[sfrpg.feats.Y0DoKrEp5WZY4WAu]{Ambush Awareness (Combat)}, @Compendium[sfrpg.feats.7VAXjEhaqadFFCqT]{Climbing Master}, @Compendium[sfrpg.feats.MrtFI7pke9a514YM]{Echolocation Attack}, @Compendium[sfrpg.feats.Gn5eNZHpqqrEZ8jh]{Memory Access}, and @Compendium[sfrpg.feats.EqQh66cutYbhmd51]{Swimming Master}. Additionally, your drone gains one of these feats as a bonus feat when you select this trick (it must meet the skill rank prerequisites for the feat). You must have a @Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.cA0NuGh484BwlDjX]{Drone} to select this mechanic trick.
